medium: Prestige-style political drama in a grand civic chamber.
lens: Moderate wide for hall scale, normal lens for tight exchanges at the floor.
movement: Slow, confident moves along walkways and between banners.
lighting: Warm white-gold overhead wash with gentle fill; faces and insignia clearly readable.
composition: Delegates framed against open space and banners, emphasizing shared identity and subtle separation.

medium: High-tech operations drama focused on screens and operators.
lens: Normal lens for consoles, slight wide for whole tiers of stations.
movement: Measured tracks along rows of analysts, short pushes to critical data displays.
lighting: Cool, even lab light with bright but controlled holographic panels.
composition: Operators and harmonic graphs share frame; workstations define strong horizontal and vertical lines.

lens: Normal and short telephoto for close character beats.
movement: Gentle arcs around Liora and her boards, lingering on equations and anomalies.
lighting: Warm desk lamps mixed with cool monitor glow, no harsh shadows.
composition: Liora framed between instruments and handwritten notes, emphasizing personal responsibility for vast systems.

medium: Reflective archive setting with quiet tension.
lens: Short telephoto down rows of shelves, normal for two-person exchanges.
movement: Slow, straight glides along stacks and across tables.
lighting: Soft, neutral, unchanging; documents and faces easily legible.
composition: Historians dwarfed by the volume of records, suggesting how much is at stake when memory fractures.

medium: Public cultural gathering, festival and speech-focused.
lens: Wide lens for crowd and stage, normal for performer reactions.
movement: Sweeping passes over the audience, then steady framing on speakers.
lighting: Diffuse golden skylight with modest accent spots on stage areas.
composition: Performers foregrounded with multiworld audience visible as a soft, hopeful backdrop.

medium: Transit drama around departure boards and gates.
lens: Wide for concourse and gates, normal for queue-level human beats.
movement: Tracking through lines, occasional rises to show overall flow.
lighting: Soft gradient lane signage plus neutral ambient, easy to read displays and faces.
composition: Travelers framed against schedule walls and docking arms, emphasizing dependence on invisible infrastructure.

medium: Industrial operations with a sense of exposure.
lens: Wide lens inside open framework, normal lens for worker interactions.
movement: Low tracks along beams and conduits, with exterior glimpses of the planet below.
lighting: Bright, focused worklights against darker structural recesses, all details visible.
composition: Workers small against heavy infrastructure, underlining how remote they are from central decisions.

medium: Community and trade hub, warm and grounded.
lens: Wide for stalls and seating, normal for conversations at tables.
movement: Handheld-style steady walks through stalls, occasional pauses for personal beats.
lighting: Warm, even interior light with subtle highlights on signage and goods.
composition: Conversations framed among racks of supplies and passing families, hinting at what will be lost.

medium: Tense technical ritual in an old facility.
lens: Normal lens in the circular room, slight wide for full apparatus.
movement: Circular tracking around the central emitter during activation.
lighting: Dim amber base light, brightening as systems energize without obscuring faces.
composition: Operators and control panels circling a central machine, underscoring the attempt to hold the network together.

medium: Space anomaly sequence with clear silhouettes.
lens: Moderate telephoto to compress ships and distortions into layered depth.
movement: Calm tracking alongside affected vessels with occasional lateral shifts.
lighting: Refracted star light in clear, vivid bands; ships remain fully legible.
composition: Vessels against distorted starlines, making the invisible corridor structure visually explicit.

lens: Wide lens for the fragmented node, telephoto for drifting survivors.
movement: Slow orbits around the damaged junction, cuts to closer debris action.
lighting: Unfiltered starlight and beacon flicker; all hull tears and motion readable.
composition: Node pieces arranged as a broken wheel with survivors and rescue craft navigating jagged paths.

lens: Normal lens at eye level, occasional slow pull-backs.
movement: Measured dolly moves between small groups and aid stations.
lighting: Lantern and heater glow supplement weak civic lighting, keeping faces clear and comforting.
composition: Clusters of people around shared resources, with empty civic architecture beyond.

lens: Wide inside corridors, normal in cramped rooms.
movement: Close-quarters tracking between partitions, emphasizing density without confusion.
lighting: Patchy but intentionally kept bright where people gather or argue.
composition: Arguments and compromises framed against improvised walls and repurposed signage.

lens: Normal to short telephoto inside the former operations floor.
movement: Slow pans across dark consoles and lit sigils.
lighting: Low ambient with crisp lines of emergency strips highlighting symbols and faces.
composition: Leaders framed beneath repurposed sigils, beginning the transformation into crowns.

lens: Normal lens for working shots, short telephoto for introspection.
movement: Gentle moves around Liora and her notes, focusing on hands and expressions.
lighting: Portable lamps and screen glow, no heavy shadows, a sense of contained focus.
composition: Liora surrounded by stacks of notes and small devices, emphasizing personal scale against vast consequences.

medium: Sparse station with high narrative weight.
lens: Wide lens for lonely structure scale, normal for handoff moments.
movement: Calm sets of moves between docking points and handoff locations.
lighting: Sharp cones of beacon and platform light, dark space beyond kept non-threatening but empty.
composition: Couriers exchanging packages at the edge of lit areas, representing fragile connections.

lens: Normal lens across the table, occasional close-ups on annotated pages.
movement: Short tracks circling the group as arguments build and cool.
lighting: Practical, even work lighting; documents and faces easy to read.
composition: Faces, notes, and diagrams in the same frame, showing doctrine emerging from lived problem-solving.

medium: Quiet archival scene with long-term implications.
lens: Short telephoto down aisles, normal near the catalog station.
movement: Slow moves along shelves, punctuated by pauses on container labels and hands.
lighting: Soft, steady vault lighting that never flickers; labels and faces clearly visible.
composition: Curators small compared to shelves, placing tiny artifacts that will later define history.
